snippet: The Food and Drug Administration approved Ibrance for women who have tumors that do not contain a protein known as HER-2.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves highly anticipated Pfizer drug Ibrance, used to treat postmenopausal women with specific type of advanced breast cancer.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration approved Ibrance for women who have tumors that do not contain a protein known as HER-2.

headline.main: Pfizer Breast Cancer Drug Wins Federal Approval
headline.print_headline: Pfizer Breast Cancer Drug Wins Federal Approval
